snippet: A so-called statement of objections that was sent to Universal spelled out concerns over the market power of the combined company.
abstract: European Commission says that the proposed purchase of EMI Music by Universal Music Group poses significant harm to competition within the recording industry, indicating that substantial concessions must be made in order for Universal to win approval.
lead_paragraph: A so-called statement of objections that was sent to Universal spelled out concerns over the market power of the combined company.

headline.seo: European Regulators Are Said to Balk at Universal-EMI Music Deal
headline.main: Europe Objects to Universal Acquisition of EMI
headline.print_headline: Europeans Are Said to Balk at Universal-EMI Music Deal
